jnpp.dao.repositories

Interface AccountDAO

  • All Superinterfaces:
    GenericDAO<AccountEntity>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccountDAOImpl

    public interface AccountDAO
extends GenericDAO<AccountEntity>
    DAO des comptes bancaire
